text: WASHINGTON  Dec 6 (Reuters) â€“ The United States is preparing to impose sanctions on at least a dozen Chinese officials over their alleged role in Beijing's disqualification of elected opposition legislators in Hong Kong  according to three sources  including a U.S. official familiar with the matter.The move  which could come as soon as Monday  will target officials from the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) as President Donald Trump's administration keeps up pressure on Beijing in his final weeks in office.
